thread.title: DERP! Kamala Harris thinks it’s outrageous that criminals might be deported for being CRIMINALS
thread.title_full: DERP! Kamala Harris thinks it’s outrageous that criminals might be deported for being CRIMINALS

author: Sam J.
title: DERP! Kamala Harris thinks it’s outrageous that criminals might be deported for being CRIMINALS
text:
DERP! Kamala Harris thinks it’s outrageous that criminals might be deported for being CRIMINALS Posted at 2:10 pm on February 23, 2017 by Sam J. 
The amount of derp in this tweet is painful. It’s outrageous the administration is saying anyone who might have committed a crime qualifies for deportations. 
— Kamala Harris (@KamalaHarris) February 23, 2017 
Being here illegally is a crime in and of itself, Kamala, and in reality should be enough for them to be deported. That’s the law. If they commit a crime on TOP of the first one they should not pass go, they should not collect $200. 
They should go home. 
— Michelin⭐SpiritChef (@CainGillespie) February 23, 2017 
Oh yeah, and it’s not just “anyone” who commits a crime, it’s illegal immigrants who quite frankly have already broken the law. But Kamala knew that, she’s just trolling. . @KamalaHarris What is outrageous is a senator openly advocating that the laws of this country do not matter to her. 
— Mujahed Kobbe (@Moj_kobe) February 23, 2017 Trending
